description.value:
No matter where you travel, precious memories keep you tethered to reality. Whatever the nature and number of your memories, you can focus on them to remind yourself which of the infinite possible realities impacts you the most: your own.

Anchor Benefit During your daily preparations, choose a skill you're trained in. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Assurance] in that skill. If you're expert in that skill, and the skill has the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Recall Knowledge] action, you gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Automatic Knowledge] in that skill.

Anchoring Effect Reduce your @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Stupefied] condition by 1. You can only benefit from this once per round.
